title: Is this a bug with Akali`s Shroud?
body:
I had a game yesterday playing Akali jungle and was at low health trying to help kill this Zed.

He ulted me so I was like just thinking to myself how I was so dead at that moment. I used my shroud and it cancel his ult... 

I was a bit surprised and we ended up killing him.

Is that suppose to happen or is this some kind of bug that I just found out?

replies.body: I shall forward this to some peeps.
I can't reproduce this on my machine, but I've let people know to keep an eye out for it.

What about Akali being able to teleport while being invisible in her shroud? 

You throw W down, cast teleport, you will be unstealthed for 0.5 seconds then re-stealth making you invisible when teleporting. The thread below is more details on how to reproduce it, plus another bug on her Ultimate stacks refreshing to full on revival at fountain. 

http://community.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bugs/ijaQEPJM-bug-akali-being-invisible-when-using-teleportammo-system-bug
I thought if you timed it right, im talking to the millisecond you could cancel his mark by going stealth or un-targetable. I know I have done it on kha and fizz before.
